game_meta.title: Tennessee Volunteers at Mississippi State Bulldogs
game_meta.venue: Davis Wade Stadium at Scott Field, Starkville, MS

weather.notes: Dry, light N wind; minimal weather impact

hype_factors: Heupel vs Lebby reunion; first UT trip to Starkville since 2012

home.name: Mississippi State Bulldogs
motivation_factors: Chance to validate 4-0 start vs ranked foe

away.name: Tennessee Volunteers
away.recent_form: Won 3 of last 4; 56 points vs UAB
motivation_factors: Top-15 team needs SEC road bounce-back

last_meeting.note: UT controlled on ground; game in Knoxville

public_betting.note: Slight public lean to home dog

odds.consensus_note: Open near TENN -9.5/62.5; market nudged to -7.5 and total up slightly; public shades MSST +7.5

key_trends: UNDER has hit in 4 of MSST’s last 5 games
situational_spots: Market move toward home dog creates contrarian fave value
MSST 134th in penalty yards per game could stall drives
TENN secondary injuries vs MSST pass game; leverage pace with totals

moneyline.rationale: Vols’ win prob ~75% with superior passing attack; price steep

spread.rationale: Buy low after drift from -9.5; slight public on dog; MSST penalties a risk

total.rationale: Number ticked up; light N wind, cleaner conditions; MSST flags and UT road script can suppress drives

best_bet.rationale: Most mispriced angle relative to pace narratives

injuries_news: TENN CBs Jermod McCoy & Rickey Gibson out; depth thin at corner
TENN OT David Sanders Jr. upgraded to probable
TENN DL Jaxson Moi probable to return
MSST LB Derion Gullette, DL Will Whitson, OL Blake Steen out
matchup_notes: TENN has a top-10 passing attack; MSST top-15 pass defense
Turnover margin: MSST +5 vs TENN even
MSST ranks 134th in penalty yards per game (~89 yds)
coaching_notes: Heupel vs Lebby: tempo-on-tempo chess match
Cowbell noise a real factor for UT’s first SEC road game

excitement_factors.playoff_implications: UT stays in early playoff hunt with road SEC win
excitement_factors.conference_impact: Sets tone in SEC standings for both
excitement_factors.narrative: Ranked road favorite vs unbeaten home dog with cowbells
tv_storylines: Can MSST stay perfect against Top-15 UT?

sources.label: On3 — How to Watch & Injury Updates
